sentences: The COP plenary addressed this issue on 30 November.
Parties noted proposals by Japan, Tuvalu, the US, Australia, Costa Rica and Grenada.
Parties agreed to leave the issue open pending an outcome from the AWG-LCA consideration of legal options in its work.
On Sunday, 11 December, during the closing plenary, the COP agreed that the item will be included in the provisional agenda of COP 18.
